casebody.data:
In the Matter of William H. WAY, trading as John Wakeman & Company, Bankrupt; Hettie E. Way, Appellant. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. November 19, 1926.) No. 113. Dills' & Towsley, of New York City (Frank H. Towsley, of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Budd & Coffey, of New York City (Bern Budd, of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before MANTON and MACK, Circuit Judges, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, District Judge.

PER CURIAM.

Order reversed in open court.
